name: pair-from-target
objective: Pair a Windows 8 computer from the target device
description: User should be able to pair a Windows 8 computer from the test device.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth technology is enabled - Bluetooth switcher is toggled on 'I'
- Bluetooth technoloy of the Windows 8 computer is activated and visible by other devices

steps.description: Click on the Bluetooth applet icon
Click on the 'Set Up a New Device' option to pair a new device and wait
steps.expected: Bluetooth wizard appears and searching for devices. Available Bluetooth devices appears

steps.description: Click on the Windows 8 computer to pair

steps.expected: Bluetooth wizard shows a pin number. A notification is received by the Windows 8 computer for the acceptance of the pairing with same pin number

steps.description: Accept the pairing on the Windows 8 computer, and then click 'Matches' on the target device
steps.expected: Bluetooth wizard displays 'Successfully set up new device <device name>'. The added device appears in the menu of Bluetooth applet. The added device appears in the Devices field of Bluetooth panel.

author: zingile

name: pair-from-device
objective: Pair the target device from a Windows 8 computer
description: User should be able to pair the target device from a Windows 8 computer.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth technology is enabled and visible by others - Bluetooth & Visibility switchers are toggled on 'I'
- Bluetooth technology of the Windows 8 computer is activated

steps.description: From the metro Desktop click successively on 'Choose Settings' > 'Change PC Settings' > 'Devices' > 'Add a device'
steps.expected: Target device appears in the list

steps.description: Click on the target device to pair
steps.expected: A notification appears on the screen of the target device

steps.description: Click on 'Matches' to accept the pairing on the target device
Click on 'yes' to end the configuration
steps.expected: The Windows 8 computer should appear in the device list of Bluetooth panel. The Windows 8 computer appears in the menu of Bluetooth applet

author: zingile

name: send
objective: The target device can send files to a Windows 8 computer
description: User should be able to send files to a Windows 8 computer.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth technology is enabled on the test device
- Bluetooth technology is enabled and visible by others on the Windows 8 computer

steps.description: Choose a file and click on 'Select'
steps.expected: A notification appears on the Windows 8 computer

steps.description: Accept the file and wait a while
Open and retrieve the file on the Windows 8 computer
steps.expected: The file is stored and can be opened

author: zingile

name: receive
objective: The target device can receive files sent by the Windows 8 computer
description: User should be able to receive files sent by the Windows 8 computer.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth technology is enabled and visible by others : Blueooth & Visibiliy switcher are togled on 'I'
- Bluetooth technology is enabled on the Windows 8 computer

steps.description: Open a file with the Windows 8 computer and send it via Bluetooth
Select the test device as receiver
steps.expected: A notification appears on the test device

steps.description: Accept the file and wait a while

author: zingile
